title: Floppy Knights
description: Attention tactics game fans! Epic Games is giving away Floppy Knights for free! This fantastic game blends  turn-based tactics with card-game strategy gameplay and amazing hand-drawn visuals. Perfect your deck and claim victory today!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library
